# This file is a part of gr-mikes_oot

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND mikes_oot_sources
    phase_tracker_pll_impl.cc
    vector_to_stream_64bit_impl.cc
    stream_to_vector_64bit_impl.cc
    streams_to_vector_64bit_impl.cc
    vector_to_streams_64bit_impl.cc
    pub_sink_64bit_impl.cc
    base_impl.cc
    tag_headers.cc
    double_to_float_stream_impl.cc
    freq_counter_impl.cc
    float_to_double_stream_impl.cc
)

set(mikes_oot_sources "${mikes_oot_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT mikes_oot_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT mikes_oot_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-mikes_oot SHARED ${mikes_oot_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-mikes_oot gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gnuradio::gnuradio-zeromq GSL::gsl GSL::gslcblas ZeroMQ::ZeroMQ)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-mikes_oot
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-mikes_oot PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_mikes_oot_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-mikes_oot PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-mikes_oot)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_mikes_oot_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-mikes_oot)

if(NOT test_mikes_oot_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_mikes_oot_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_mikes_oot_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("mikes_oot_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
